## Workspace.getVariable() method

Find the variable by the given name and return it. Return null if not found.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getVariable(name: string, opt_type?: string): VariableModel | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name to check for. |
|  opt\_type | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of the variable. If not provided it defaults to the empty string, which is a specific type. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel.md) \| null

The variable with the given name.
